Hellplague:
 
The femme turned around in the seat and accessed the computerfor a manifest of what was on board.  
 
"In a red crate in the storage room there is a small scanner, you can use that," Hellplague said, turning around.

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
"Last time this happened, was a short time before before I found this
ship.  I found myself burried upside-down in the sand, with no
recollection of how I got there.  Before that I had been assisting a
few bots on another crashed ship with repairs, but I have no idea
where that was, how far away or whether they are still there or not.

"It's not that I had any special attachment to that group either, I
just sumbled upon that ship the same way I found this one.  I am not
certain, but these memory losses may be happening more often than I
care to admit...."

Celeron felt more at ease with sharing this now there was only one
other bot onboard.

"Do you have any diagnostic equipment onboard?  I have not had a full
repair and diagnosis for a very long time..."


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

__________________________________________________
